links.belarusian: "Ты не маеш амнезіі, Гары. Ты п'яны".

links.title: You: ""Your voice is so beautiful.""
links.english: "Your voice is so beautiful."
links.polish: „Masz taki piękny głos”.
links.belarusian: "У цябе такі прыгожы голас".

links.title: Payphone: ""No-no..." She's waking up now. "It..."
links.english: "No-no..." She's waking up now. "It's *you*, isn't it? It's you..."
links.polish: „O nie, nie...” – zaczęła się rozbudzać. „To *ty*, prawda? To ty...”.
links.belarusian: "О не, не..." – пачала прачынацца. "Гэта *ты*, праўда? Гэта ты...".

links.title: You: ""Good bye.""
links.english: "Good bye."
links.polish: „Żegnaj”.
links.belarusian: "Да пабачэння".

links.title: Payphone: "A sigh. She heard you, but she does..."
links.english: A sigh. She heard you, but she does not hang up. And neither do you. You can't.
links.polish: Westchnienie. Słyszała cię, ale się nie rozłącza. Ty też nie. Nie jesteś w stanie.
links.belarusian: Вздыханне. Яна цябе чула, але не адключаецца. Ты таксама не. Ты не ў стане.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "That's it. You're caught in a trap...."
links.english: That's it. You're caught in a trap. It'll take quite a while for the shit-circus to end now.
links.polish: Stało się. Wpadłeś w pułapkę. Wyrwanie się z tego pierdolnika sporo ci teraz zajmie.
links.belarusian: Стаалася. Ты трапіў у пастку. Вырыванне з гэтага глупства цяпер шмат часу ў цябе зойме.

links.title: Half Light: "Pitiful and terrifying. You feel yo..."
links.english: Pitiful and terrifying. You feel your pulse rise with each ring...
links.polish: Żałosny i przerażający. Czujesz, jak z każdym sygnałem twoje tętno przyspiesza...
links.belarusian: Жаласны і страшны. Чуеш, як з кожным сігналам твой пульс паскараецца...

links.title: You: "Stop!"
links.english: Stop!
links.polish: Przestań!
links.belarusian: Спыні!

links.title: Interfacing: "41 -- 44 -- 47 --  it's too late no..."
links.english: 41 -- 44 -- 47 --  it's too late now, the movement is almost mechanical.
links.polish: 41... 44... 47... Już za późno – ruch jest niemal mechaniczny.
links.belarusian: 41... 44... 47... Ужо занадта позна – рух амаль механічны.

links.title: Interfacing: "Again you close your eyes -- and ag..."
links.english: Again you close your eyes -- and again your fingers move on the rotary dial. Ten metallic rings as the dial returns to zero after each number.
links.polish: Ponownie zamykasz oczy, a twój palec znów porusza się po okrągłej tarczy. Słyszysz dziesięć metalicznych uderzeń – po jednym za każdym razem, kiedy mechanizm wraca do pierwotnego położenia po wybraniu jednej z cyfr.
links.belarusian: Зноў заплюшчваеш вочы, а твой палец зноў рухаецца па круглай шкале. Чуеш дзесяць металічных удараў – па адным кожны раз, калі механізм вяртаецца ў першапачатковае становішча пасля выбару адной з лічбаў.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "And calling -- for two minutes now...."
links.english: And calling -- for two minutes now. You're out of luck. No one's home there either. But the payphone still has your ten cents in there...
links.polish: I dzwoni. Już od dwóch minut. Pech – tam też nikogo nie ma w domu. Ale telefon wciąż ma twoje niewykorzystane dziesięć centów...
links.belarusian: І тэлефануе. Ужо дзве хвіліны. Няшчасце — там таксама нікога няма дома. Але тэлефон усё яшчэ мае твае нявыкарыстаныя дзесяць цэнтаў...

links.title: Interfacing: "You close your eyes and feel your f..."
links.english: You close your eyes and feel your finger move on the rotary dial. You start with 005, as before...
links.polish: Zamykasz oczy i czujesz, jak twój palec porusza się po okrągłej tarczy. Tak jak poprzednio, zaczynasz od 005...
links.belarusian: Вы закрываеце вочы і адчуваеце, як ваш палец рухаецца па кругавой цыферблаце. Як і раней, пачынаеце з 005...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The area code for Revachol Zone of..."
links.english: The area code for Revachol Zone of Control.
links.polish: Numer kierunkowy Strefy Kontroli Revacholu.
links.belarusian: Код зоны кантролю Рэвашолю.

links.title: Payphone: "Followed by seven digits at random...."
links.english: Followed by seven digits at random. The last one makes the silence turn into a ring. It's calling...
links.polish: Później wybierasz siedem losowych cyfr. Ostatnia sprawia, że cisza zmienia się w sygnał. Dokądś dzwonisz...
links.belarusian: Пазней ты выбіраеш сем выпадковых лічбаў. Апошняя робіць так, што цішыня змяняецца ў сігнал. Кудысьці тэлефануеш...

links.title: Payphone: "Still calling..."
links.english: Still calling...
links.polish: Wciąż dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Усё яшчэ тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Still..."
links.english: Still...
links.polish: I wciąż...
links.belarusian: І яшчэ...

links.title: Payphone: "Time keeps passing. In the distance..."
links.english: Time keeps passing. In the distance, seagulls squawk -- no one is home at this number. But the coin... it's still in there... you find yourself thinking:
links.polish: Czas mija nieubłaganie. Z oddali dobiega cię krzyk mew. Pod tym numerem nikogo nie ma w domu. Ale moneta wciąż tkwi w aparacie... Myślisz sobie:
links.belarusian: Час няўмольна цячэ. Здалёк даносяцца крыкі чаек. Па гэтым нумары нікога няма дома. Але манета ўсё яшчэ застаецца ў апараце... Думаеш сабе:

links.title: Interfacing: "What were you trying to achieve by..."
links.english: What were you trying to achieve by closing your eyes? Did you want your muscle memory to take over and call somewhere? Where?
links.polish: Co chciałeś osiągnąć, zamykając oczy? Chciałeś, żeby stery przejęła twoja pamięć mięśniowa? Żeby zadzwoniła dokądś za ciebie? Dokąd?
links.belarusian: Што ты хацеў дасягнуць, закрыўшы вочы? Хацеў, каб кіраванне ўзяла на сябе твая цягліцавая памяць? Каб яна патэлефанавала кудысьці за цябе? Куды?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Home?"
links.english: Home?
links.polish: Do domu?
links.belarusian: Дадому?

links.title: Inland Empire: "He doesn't have a home. His home is..."
links.english: He doesn't have a home. His home is under a boat.
links.polish: Nie ma domu. Jego dom to przewrócona łódź.
links.belarusian: Няма дому. Яго дом — гэта перакуленая лодка.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He doesn't have a home. Not anymore..."
links.english: He doesn't have a home. Not anymore.
links.polish: Nie ma domu. Już nie.
links.belarusian: Няма дома. Больш не.

links.title: Endurance: "His own *heart*."
links.english: His own *heart*.
links.polish: Do jego własnego *serca*.
links.belarusian: Да яго ўласнага *сэрца*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's *really* time to stop this now..."
links.english: It's *really* time to stop this now.
links.polish: *Naprawdę* najwyższy czas już to przerwać.
links.belarusian: *Сапраўды* надышоў час гэта спыніць.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Yeah, *bratan*. We've had all the f..."
links.english: Yeah, *bratan*. We've had all the fun there was to have here. And it wasn't much.
links.polish: Tak, *bratan*. Zabawiliśmy się tak bardzo, jak tylko się dało. Czyli nie za dużo.
links.belarusian: Так, *браценя*. Пабавіліся настолькі, наколькі маглі. То бок не надта шмат.

links.title: You: ""You want my MONEY?!" (Punch the ph..."
links.english: "You want my MONEY?!" (Punch the phone.)
links.polish: „Chcesz mojej FORSY?!” (Uderz telefon).
links.belarusian: "Хочаш маіх ГРОШАЙ?!" (Ударце тэлефон).

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and your knu..."
links.english: The cold metal is hard and your knuckles bleed.
links.polish: Zimny metal jest twardy; twoje knykcie zaczynają krwawić.
links.belarusian: Халодны метал цвёрды; твае кулакі пачынаюць крывавіць.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Takes your mind away from that voic..."
links.english: Takes your mind away from that voice, for one second at least...
links.polish: Przestań myśleć o tym głosie. Chociaż na krótką chwilę...
links.belarusian: Перастань думаць пра гэты голас. Хоць на кароткі момант...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's enough now, officer..." The..."
links.english: "That's enough now, officer..." The lieutenant stands at a distance.
links.polish: „Dość tego, oficerze...” – stwierdza porucznik stojący kawałek dalej.
links.belarusian: "Досыць гэтага, афіцэр..." — заяўляе лейтэнант, стоячы крыху далей.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Punch it again, the pain is good."
links.english: Punch it again, the pain is good.
links.polish: Uderz jeszcze raz. Ten ból jest dobry.
links.belarusian: Бі яшчэ раз. Гэты боль добры.

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and your knu..."
links.english: The cold metal is hard and your knuckles bleed a little...
links.polish: Zimny metal jest twardy; twoje knykcie zaczynają lekko krwawić...
links.belarusian: Халодны метал цвёрды; твае косташкі пачынаюць лёгка крывавіць...

links.title: Payphone: "The cold metal is hard and hurts yo..."
links.english: The cold metal is hard and hurts your knuckles. You look at them turning purple.
links.polish: Zimny metal jest twardy i przyprawia cię o ból knykci. Patrzysz, jak przybierają fioletowy odcień.
links.belarusian: Халодны метал цвёрды і выклікае боль у суставах пальцаў. Вы глядзіце, як яны набываюць фіялетавы адценне.

links.title: You: ""You want more money now, huh?! YOU..."
links.english: "You want more money now, huh?! YOU WANT FUCKING MONEY?!!!?" (Punch the phone again.)
links.polish: „Co, chcesz więcej forsy, tak?! CHCESZ, KURWA, PIENIĘDZY?!!!” (Uderz telefon jeszcze raz).
links.belarusian: "Што, хочаш больш грошай, так?! ХОЧАШ, БЛЯТЬ, ГРОШАЙ?!!!" (Удары тэлефон яшчэ раз).

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.english: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money.
links.polish: Nie dał ci *ani trochę* zabawy za te pieniądze.
links.belarusian: Ён не даў нават трохі забаўкі за гэтыя грошы.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your hand is swelling up."
links.english: Your hand is swelling up.
links.polish: Twoja dłoń puchnie.
links.belarusian: Твая рука пухне.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer -- that's enough. Let's re..."
links.english: "Officer -- that's enough. Let's return to work..."
links.polish: „Oficerze, dość tego. Wracajmy do pracy...”
links.belarusian: "Офіцэр, даволі гэтага. Вяртаемся да працы..."

links.title: Volition: "That's right. Walk away."
links.english: That's right. Walk away.
links.polish: Właśnie tak. Po prostu odejdź.
links.belarusian: Менавіта так. Проста сыходзь.

links.title: Logic: "It's over."
links.english: It's over.
links.polish: To koniec.
links.belarusian: Гэта канец.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Fuck it, it doesn't hurt."
links.english: Fuck it, it doesn't hurt.
links.polish: Jebać, nie boli mnie to.
links.belarusian: Мяне гэта не хвалюе.

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.english: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money. Nothing. Your hand is turning blue now... blood drips to the ground.
links.polish: Nie dał ci *ani trochę* zabawy za te pieniądze. Zero. Dłoń robi ci się niebieska... Krew skapuje na ziemię.
links.belarusian: Ён не даў табе *ні крыху* весялосці за гэтыя грошы. Нуль. Рука робіцца сіняй... Кроў капае на зямлю.

links.title: Payphone: "It didn't give you *any* fun for th..."
links.english: It didn't give you *any* fun for that money. Your hand is turning blue now... blood drips to the ground.
links.polish: Nie dał ci *ani trochę* zabawy za te pieniądze. Dłoń robi ci się niebieska... Krew skapuje na ziemię.
links.belarusian: Ён не даў табе *ні крышачкі* забавы за гэтыя грошы. Рука ў цябе сініе... Кроў капае на зямлю.

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial the long p..."
links.english: Put 10 cents in and dial the long phone number again.
links.polish: Wrzuć 10 centów i kolejny raz podaj ten długi numer telefonu.
links.belarusian: Укінь 10 цэнтаў і зноў увядзі гэты доўгі нумар тэлефона.

links.title: Payphone: "You dial the number again -- twenty..."
links.english: You dial the number again -- twenty six pulls of the rotary dial. The machine eats the coin and a terrifying ocean of distance rustles in your ear...
links.polish: Wykręcasz numer raz jeszcze – dwadzieścia sześć obrotów tarczy. Maszyna połyka monetę, w uszach szumi ci przerażający ocean telefonicznej linii...
links.belarusian: Вы набіраеце нумар яшчэ раз – дваццаць шэсць абаротаў цыферблата. Машына праглынае манету, у вушах шуміць страшны акіян тэлефоннай лініі...

links.title: Payphone: "In the middle of it -- a familiar r..."
links.english: In the middle of it -- a familiar ring. Small. Distorted.
links.polish: A wśród tego wszystkiego – znajome dzwonienie. Ciche. Zniekształcone.
links.belarusian: А сярод усяго гэтага - знаёмае званенне. Ціхае. Скажонае.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Volition: "Put it down."
links.english: Put it down.
links.polish: Odłóż słuchawkę.
links.belarusian: Пакладзі слухаўку.

links.title: Authority: "Before it's too late, please."
links.english: Before it's too late, please.
links.polish: Proszę, zanim będzie za późno.
links.belarusian: Калі ласка, пакуль не стала занадта позна.

links.title: You: "Hang up."
links.english: Hang up.
links.polish: Rozłącz się.
links.belarusian: Адключыся.

links.title: Payphone: "The headset lands in the cradle wit..."
links.english: The headset lands in the cradle with a clank.
links.polish: Słuchawka osiada ze stukotem na swoim miejscu.
links.belarusian: Слухаўка з грукатам упадае на сваё месца.

links.title: Volition: "Now walk away. Forget about this. W..."
links.english: Now walk away. Forget about this. Walk away and do police work. *BURY* this in yourself and move on.
links.polish: A teraz odejdź. Zapomnij o tym. Ruszaj wykonywać policyjne zadania. *ZAKOP* w sobie to, co się stało, i ruszaj przed siebie.
links.belarusian: А цяпер адыдзі. Забудзь пра гэта. Рухацца, выконваючы паліцэйскія заданні. *ЗАКОПВАЦЬ* у сабе тое, што адбылося, і рушыць наперад.

links.title: You: "Let it call!"
links.english: Let it call!
links.polish: Niech dzwoni!
links.belarusian: Няхай тэлефануе!

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Звоніць...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Званіць...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Empathy: "It looks like she does not want to..."
links.english: It looks like she does not want to pick it up, Harry. Stop scaring her.
links.polish: Zdaje się, że nie chce odbierać, Harry. Przestań ją straszyć.
links.belarusian: Здаецца, яна не хоча браць трубку, Гары. Перастань яе палохаць.

links.title: You: "Why?"
links.english: Why?
links.polish: Czemu?
links.belarusian: Чаму?

links.title: Empathy: "C'mon, you know why."
links.english: C'mon, you know why.
links.polish: No bez żartów, wiesz przecież czemu.
links.belarusian: Без жартаў, ты ж ведаеш чаму.

links.title: You: "Still, let it ring."
links.english: Still, let it ring.
links.polish: Niech dzwoni dalej.
links.belarusian: Няхай званіць далей.

links.title: You: "Hang up."
links.english: Hang up.
links.polish: Rozłącz się.
links.belarusian: Раз'яднайся.

links.title: You: "Just let it ring."
links.english: Just let it ring.
links.polish: Pozwól mu dzwonić dalej.
links.belarusian: Дазволь яму званіць далей.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: ""Harry, please..." A sad voice answ..."
links.english: "Harry, please..." A sad voice answers, dressed in distortion.
links.polish: „Harry, proszę...” – odpowiada smutny, ubrany w płaszcz zakłóceń głos.
links.belarusian: "Гары, калі ласка..." – адказвае засмучаны голас, апрануты ў плашч перашкод.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Underneath it she is naked and warm..."
links.english: Underneath it she is naked and warm under a blanket.
links.polish: Pod ich warstwą jest tylko jej nagość i ciepło nagrzanego koca.
links.belarusian: Пад іх пластом ёсць толькі яе разнята і цяпло нагрэтага коўдры.

links.title: You: ""You're warm.""
links.english: "You're warm."
links.polish: „Jesteś ciepła”.
links.belarusian: "Ты цёплая".

links.title: Payphone: "There's a sigh."
links.english: There's a sigh.
links.polish: Słychać westchnienie.
links.belarusian: Чуецца ўздых.

links.title: You: ""You're naked, aren't you?" (Beat t..."
links.english: "You're naked, aren't you?" (Beat the handset against the phone.)
links.polish: „Jesteś naga, prawda?” (Uderz słuchawką o aparat).
links.belarusian: "Ты голая, праўда?" (удары трубку аб апарат).

links.title: Payphone: "You can't hear her reply."
links.english: You can't hear her reply.
links.polish: Nie słyszysz jej odpowiedzi.
links.belarusian: Ты не чуеш яе адказу.

links.title: You: ""I need answers to my *mystery*.""
links.english: "I need answers to my *mystery*."
links.polish: „Potrzebuję odpowiedzi, żeby rozwikłać moją *tajemnicę*”.
links.belarusian: "Мне патрэбны адказы, каб раскрыць маю *таямніцу*".

links.title: Payphone: ""Please. I am going to hang up now,..."
links.english: "Please. I am going to hang up now, okay?"
links.polish: „Proszę cię. Rozłączę się już, dobrze?”
links.belarusian: "Калі ласка цябе. Я ўжо адключуся, добра?"

links.title: Payphone: "Phone hanging up."
links.english: Phone hanging up.
links.polish: Odgłos odkładanej słuchawki.
links.belarusian: Гук пакладзенай слухаўкі.

links.title: Payphone: "Disconnect tone."
links.english: Disconnect tone.
links.polish: Sygnał zerwanego połączenia.
links.belarusian: Сігнал разарванага злучэння.

links.title: You: ""I need to know who you are. WHO AR..."
links.english: "I need to know who you are. WHO ARE YOU?!"
links.polish: „Muszę wiedzieć, kim jesteś. KTOŚ TY?!”
links.belarusian: "Мне трэба ведаць, хто ты. ХТО ТЫ?!"

links.title: You: ""'Harry please?!' -- I am going to..."
links.english: "'Harry please?!' -- I am going to *end* this call, dammit."
links.polish: „»Harry, proszę«?! *Kończę* tę rozmowę, do jasnej cholery”.
links.belarusian: "Гары, калі ласка"?! *Я заканчваю* гэты размову, халера ясна".

links.title: Payphone: ""Please do. Just please do.""
links.english: "Please do. Just please do."
links.polish: „Tak zrób. Proszę, zrób to”.
links.belarusian: "Так зрабі. Калі ласка, зрабі гэта".

links.title: You: ""There was someone there before. I..."
links.english: "There was someone there before. I heard someone. Who's there with you?"
links.polish: „Ktoś tam wcześniej był. Słyszałem kogoś. Z kim jesteś?”
links.belarusian: "Хтось там раней быў. Я чуў кагосьці. З кім ты?"

links.title: Payphone: "She does not answer. All you hear i..."
links.english: She does not answer. All you hear is hiss.
links.polish: Nie odpowiada. Słyszysz tylko cichy syk.
links.belarusian: Не адказвае. Чуецца толькі ціхае сіпенне.

links.title: You: ""Pick it up!""
links.english: "Pick it up!"
links.polish: „Odbierajże!”
links.belarusian: "Адказвай жа!"

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: You: "Just let it ring."
links.english: Just let it ring.
links.polish: Pozwól mu dzwonić dalej.
links.belarusian: Дазволь яму тэлефанаваць далей.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: You: "Put 10 cents in and dial the long p..."
links.english: Put 10 cents in and dial the long phone number one more time.
links.polish: Wrzuć 10 centów i jeszcze raz podaj ten długi numer telefonu.
links.belarusian: Кінь 10 цэнтаў і зноў назаві гэты доўгі нумар тэлефона.

links.title: Payphone: "You dial the number again -- as you..."
links.english: You dial the number again -- as you've done many times. You remember it well now: 001 -- 41 -- 44 -- 47 -- 11 -- 17 -- 361 -- 451 -- 67 -- 451 -- 451.
links.polish: Wykręcasz numer ponownie, jak robiłeś to już wiele razy. Dobrze go pamiętasz: 001... 41... 44... 47... 11... 17... 361... 451... 67... 451... 451.
links.belarusian: Вы набіраеце нумар зноў, як рабілі гэта ўжо шмат разоў. Добра яго памятаеце: 001... 41... 44... 47... 11... 17... 361... 451... 67... 451... 451.

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Званіць...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Званіць...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Званіць...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "Calling..."
links.english: Calling...
links.polish: Dzwoni...
links.belarusian: Тэлефануе...

links.title: Payphone: "And calling -- for who knows how lo..."
links.english: And calling -- for who knows how long. But no one answers. You need to insert more money to call again.
links.polish: I dzwoni, kto wie, jak długo? Ale nikt nie odbiera. Musisz wrzucić więcej pieniędzy, żeby zadzwonić jeszcze raz.
links.belarusian: І тэлефануе, хто ведае, як доўга? Але ніхто не адказвае. Ты павінен кінуць больш грошай, каб патэлефанаваць яшчэ раз.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.english: [Leave.]
links.polish: [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: [Адыдзі].

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "There's still some unused change in..."
dialogueTree.english: There's still some unused change in there -- the machine waits for a number to be dialled.
dialogueTree.polish: Wciąż zostało ci trochę niewykorzystanych impulsów. Urządzenie czeka, aż wybierzesz numer.
dialogueTree.belarusian: У цябе ўсё яшчэ засталося трохі нявыкарыстаных імпульсаў. Прылада чакае, пакуль ты абярэш нумар.

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "You pick up the handset. There's a..."
dialogueTree.english: You pick up the handset. There's a tone -- the machine is operable.
dialogueTree.polish: Podnosisz słuchawkę. Słyszysz sygnał – urządzenie działa.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Вы падымаеце слухаўку. Вы чуеце сігнал – прылада працуе.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs apathetically..."
links.english: The lieutenant shrugs apathetically, then walks a little distance away to concentrate on his notes. Looks like he'd rather not get into it again.
links.polish: Porucznik wzrusza apatycznie ramionami i odchodzi na bok, aby skupić się na swoich notatkach. Wygląda na to, że woli się w to już nie mieszać.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант абыякава паціскае плячыма і адыходзіць убок, каб засяродзіцца на сваіх нататках. Здаецца, ён аддае перавагу больш не ўмешвацца ў гэта.

dialogueTree.title: Payphone: "A metal payphone under a yellow pla..."
dialogueTree.english: A metal payphone under a yellow plastic dome. You could use it to call someone, unless you're out of change...
dialogueTree.polish: Metalowy telefon na monety pod żółtym zadaszeniem. Możesz z niego do kogoś zadzwonić. Chyba że nie masz drobnych...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Металічны тэлефон для манет пад жоўтым навесам. З яго можна камусьці пазваніць. Калі, канешне, у цябе ёсць драбяза...

links.title: You: "Pick up the handset."
links.english: Pick up the handset.
links.polish: Podnieś słuchawkę.
links.belarusian: Падыміце слухаўку.

links.title: Payphone: "You hear the tone -- the machine is..."
links.english: You hear the tone -- the machine is operable.
links.polish: Słyszysz sygnał. Urządzenie działa.
links.belarusian: Вы чуеце сігнал. Прылада працуе.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.english: [Leave.]
links.polish: [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: [Адыдзі].
